review: I think this movie was really needful to show about the actually how the corporate world is going on. also useful to understand its impact on whole society . To spread awareness about morality & etics in corporate world that movie done well.

Asian interpretation of how business can be mismanaged or managed by copy pasting from originally published/studied/stolen/spied/copied version of a business to be conducted. It's like importing tamarind from Africa and add masala and exporting it to America or Europe üçÜü•ï

It's a strong message that one should not only be cautious but alarmed about the insensitive and unemotional corporate behavior. One should uphold the humanity and should never develop a sentimental nexus with the corporate organization.
Movie clearly shows how horrible the corporate world is, especially in case of domestic market and where businessman has no sympathy even to their realtionship üò±
